price: 55.Diggah Baaxó bagul mutuccu ittaamak Yallih xaqul umaaneh gacak raqtam koroositeh yan maray koroosannuk kate wee kinni, toysa usun inkinnah mayaaminan.
arabic: إِنَّ شَرَّ ٱلدَّوَآبِّ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: inna sharra al-dawābi ʿinda al-lahi alladhīna kafarū fahum lā yu'minūna
